name: SortComparator
desc: A comparison algorithm for a specified type.

items.name: var order: SortOrder
items.desc: The sort order that the comparator uses to compare.

items.name: static var localized: String.Comparator
items.desc: A comparator that compares a string using a localized comparison in the current locale.

items.name: static var localizedStandard: String.Comparator
items.desc: A comparator that compares a string using a localized, numeric comparison in the current locale.

items.name: func compare(Self.Compared, Self.Compared) -> ComparisonResult
items.desc: Provides the relative ordering of two elements based on the sort order of the comparator.

items.name: associatedtype Compared
items.desc: A type that the sort comparator can compare.
